segments.text: What a disaster in that kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water everywhere from the sink, just pouring out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's drying a plate, ignoring the flood at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress might get soaked soon, what a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids are up to no good with the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on a stool that's tilting backward dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stuffing his hand in the jar like a thief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl begging for one, so sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor's slippery now, someone will fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden looks perfect, inside it's gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hate seeing water damage like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why can't they be more careful?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole thing makes me queasy.
segments.speaker: PAR
